title: r/Askreddit What's The Pettiest Thing An Adult Did To You When You Were A Child?
description: r/Askreddit Do you remember a time from when you were a child when an adult was a complete douchebag to you for no reason? Today's Askreddit thread is filled with stories of mean adults, terrible parents, and idiotic teachers. They say that you should respect your elders, but let's be honest: a lot of adults just aren't worthy of respect. If like this content, follow for more daily Reddit videos!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
